query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_publications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_organizations) as organizations_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as documents_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT source) FROM research_publications) as unique_sources;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_organizations) as organizations_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as documents_count,
